ai-anya-e0702n9:0_0: Discussion of the proper conduct in regard to those who were requested
ai-anya-e0702n9:1_0: (but) I will build the Mahāthūpa from the Great Wood on the road, and I will speak in accordance with the Teaching.”
ai-anya-e0702n9:2_0: The third Great Elder Siggava went to the Disciple of the Ārāma, in the Mahāsaṅgītikaspajāpatī Gotamī, the precincts of the Faith. This prince made the Faith.
ai-anya-e0702n9:3_0: The Thera Mahādhammarakkhita, having become an unfinished in the Mahādhammarakkhita by precious talk, and then proceeded to the Mahātittha 84,000 people,000 people, and having this 84,000 people, prepared a great deportments.
ai-anya-e0702n9:4_0: The Seer of the Dhamma, having gone to Mahāraṭṭha,
ai-anya-e0702n9:5_0: Having made an agreement to the populace, they made a great sacrifice,
ai-anya-e0702n9:6_0: Herein, it seems that people in the past were present, there and so on were means of most food.
ai-anya-e0702n9:6_1: Because of that the Elder Mahādhammarakkhita taught the Great Birth Story.
ai-anya-e0702n9:6_2: and having born there, people who want to be reborn there,
ai-anya-e0702n9:6_3: and he gave the monks to massage and rub them.
ai-anya-e0702n9:6_4: And during the rainy season residence in a time they listened to many people. They listen to many does what is happening.
ai-anya-e0702n9:7_0: And that’s where the mendicants are standing, standing benefactors, paying homage to the mendicants.
ai-anya-e0702n9:7_1: The Thera Mahādhammarakkhita, Mahārakkhita, Mahārakkhita, having preached the Truth near the Avakadhammarakkhita, the chief of the Vinaya, preached the Dhamma to the Parinibbāna of the Theras.
ai-anya-e0702n9:8_0: Whatever similes has of the simile of the eight similes of the man who is added and including each other.
ai-anya-e0702n9:8_1: (The Thera) who lived in that Nāga Ciravāsipati put to the Dispensation of the Faith in the Collection of the Faith.
ai-anya-e0702n9:8_2: He who, having gone to the country of Laṅkā together with the Council, went to Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī together with the Bhikkhunīs, where he sat on the seat spread out, together with the Bhikkhunīs, and chopped the water, where he sat down. After taking the message, he sat down,
ai-anya-e0702n9:8_3: The one who stands in this way should be seen to be found inside the Dispensation, and in this way.
ai-anya-e0702n9:9_0: After attaining Nibbāna in the third conqueror of the Buddha, the two thousand roars of the lion’s roar, but the rainy season residence, (where did) in the royal longhouse to Jayas.
ai-anya-e0702n9:9_1: (Having) two measures, there are two kinds of monastery dwellers at the monastery of inhabited by preparing the dwellings.
ai-anya-e0702n9:9_2: In this way the Great City is very blameworthy in the Dispensation, and having become established in the Refuges.”
ai-anya-e0702n9:10_0: This is the thirteen position named Mahāmeghavana.
